dublin_core.dcvalue: Fragmented and siloed data collection systems mean that there is often a need to integrate data from different sources Learn how VecnaCares is integrating different tools with DHIS in order to enable its use as a reporting platform Hear Tanzania s Ministry of Health share its experience in setting up client level and aggregate level data exchange systems between various public and private hospitals and systems in the country And learn about the VAN Dashboard developed in Mozambique by VillageReach to combine data from multiple EPI data sources for use in an easily accessible actionable way Speakers included Edwin Nyella HIS Advisor MCSPFidelis Ronjino ICT Officer MOHCDGEC TanzaniaPaul Amendola Director VecnaCaresVidya Sampath Data and Analytics Incubator VillageReach
